tpep_pickup_datetime.description: Date and time when the meter was engaged

tpep_dropoff_datetime.description: Date and time when the meter was disengaged

passenger_count.description: Number of passengers in the vehicle (driver entered value)

trip_distance.description: Trip distance in miles reported by the taximeter

store_and_fwd_flag.description: Trip record held in vehicle memory before sending (Y=store and forward, N=not)

PULocationID.description: TLC Taxi Zone where the meter was engaged

DOLocationID.description: TLC Taxi Zone where the meter was disengaged

fare_amount.description: Time-and-distance fare calculated by the meter

extra.description: Miscellaneous extras and surcharges (rush hour, overnight)

mta_tax.description: $0.50 MTA tax automatically triggered based on metered rate

tip_amount.description: Tip amount (automatically populated for credit card, cash tips not included)

tolls_amount.description: Total amount of all tolls paid in trip

improvement_surcharge.description: $0.30 improvement surcharge assessed on hailed trips

total_amount.description: Total amount charged to passengers (does not include cash tips)

congestion_surcharge.description: Congestion surcharge for trips in Manhattan south of 96th Street
congestion_surcharge.note: Introduced in 2019 - may not be present in older files

airport_fee.description: $1.25 fee for pickups at LaGuardia and JFK airports
airport_fee.note: Added in more recent data - may not be present in older files
